fields.title: S8 Launch Identity
fields.subtitle: Samsung
fields.description: In April 2017, Samsung released its latest novel smartphone, the Galaxy S8. R/GA was tasked to develop a campaign launch of universality and sophistication for the American market and to align with Samsung’s global strategy. Design direction and prototypes of generative expressions were developed to direct and inspire the Galaxy S8 campaign launch commercials.

fields.title: Results
fields.description: 4 global TV commercials inspired by the generative expressions

fields.title: Zig - App for lifestyle & mobility
fields.subtitle: ComfortDelGro
fields.description:
Zig is a mobile lifestyle platform that innovatively combines journey planning, transport booking, and lifestyle discovery into an all-in-one mobile app built for the global land transport giant ComfortDelGro.

Leveraging multidisciplinary consulting design and technology teams from R/GA, Zig is crafted from the ground up using modern technology, design, and branding, creating unique value for users and becoming Singapore’s first-ever mobility lifestyle platform.

fields.title: Prototypes
fields.description: Multiple iterations of interactive prototypes to determine the final "Water Resistant" experience.

fields.title: Result
fields.description: An endeavour to embrace AI and personality, an inspiration for each apprentice

fields.title: Further Exploration
fields.description: Turning discoveries of natural elements into generative expressions

fields.title: Collaboration
fields.description: A close collaboration between design and technology

fields.title: Google Standards
fields.description: A central hub from Google serving over 200,000 users.

fields.title: Vision Poster
fields.subtitle: R/GA APAC
fields.description: The project is a data visualization + generative design that captures collaborative conversations that spark innovation across R/GA offices within the Asia-Pacific region. It has become one of R/GA Singapore’s featured projects to demonstrate creativity and innovativeness.

fields.title: Collaboration
fields.description: Between Design and Technology.

fields.title: Hū: The Spectrum of Being
fields.subtitle: Samsung
fields.description: In September 2016, Samsung approached R/GA to build an immersive installation at the 837 flagship space in New York City. Carlos Serrao, R/GA and Samsung combined their expertise in digital ingenuity, photography and technology to present the public with an interactive portrait creation experience that uniquely captures the individual.

fields.title: Design
fields.description: How to visualize “Collaboration”?

fields.title: Experience
fields.description: Public Transportation + Taxi Booking + Restaurants + Deals + Takeaway

fields.title: R/GA Academy
fields.subtitle: R/GA
fields.description: In August 2017, R/GA released its first artificial intelligence based generative expression for Academy, its newly minted apprenticeship program in New York. The expression was developed to reflect the personality of every apprentice, all held within an ‘A’ structure, representing both Academy and the apprentices.

fields.title: S8 Unbox - An Interactive Website
fields.subtitle: Samsung
fields.description: For Samsung Galaxy S8 smartphone, R/GA was tasked to launch a mobile site where users can touch and interact with the phone and explore main features. We leveraged various sensors and triggers on smartphones (such as accelerometer, gyroscope, vibration motor) and delivered a full-3D immersive experience to users.

fields.title: Concept
fields.description: How to define “Collaboration to Innovate” for R/GA?

fields.title: Beyond Time
fields.subtitle: Shiseido
fields.description: “Beyond Time” is an interactive installation/time travel experience at Shiseido’s Global Innovation Center. The installation lets pairs see each other at various stages of their lives with their faces digitally aged, leading them to discover both physical and mental beauty in aging.

fields.title: Prototyping
fields.description: Use data to power a generative design exercise with TouchDesigner.

fields.title: Digital Illustration
fields.subtitle: Personal Project
fields.description: Some digital drawings since 2014, completed with the iPad and Procreate (a digital illustration app). The portraits were inspired by  the TV series “Sherlock”, “Game of Thrones” and my cats Bobo and Mumu. Video recordings of the drawing process are included.

fields.title: Experience
fields.description: Friends, family, and loved ones speak with one another through time.

fields.title: Equilibrium
fields.subtitle: Personal Project
fields.description: Equilibrium is a collaborative digital game, designed and developed for the physical computing program held at ITP, Tisch School of the Arts in New York University. It is a digital game that combines emotive interactions, game mechanics, industrial design and a refined aesthetic culminating in hardware and software.
